text: Víctor Luis Fernando Roldán Campos (15 October 1921 – 23 June 2019) was a Chilean footballer. He played as a defender. He played club football for Club Deportivo Universidad Católica. He also represented Chile at the 1950 FIFA World Cup. Roldán died on 23 June 2019, at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:1950 FIFA World Cup players Category:Chilean footballers
title: Fernando Roldán
